original_title: Sri Lanka rupee close at 300/303 to the US dollar, bond and bill yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka spot to the US dollar closed at 300.00/303.00 rupees while bonds and bills were down Monday, dealers said.
The Spot US dollar closed at 296.50/298.00 rupees on Friday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 22.90/10 percent, down from 23.20/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 14.15/35 percent, down from 24.40/70 percent from Friday.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 closed at 25.75/26.00 percent, unchanged from Friday.
A six-month maturing bill closed at 20.00/75 percent down from 21.00/30 percent from its last close.
A one-year bill closed at 18.25/19.00 percent down from 18.25/75 percent from its last close.
